properties.sql:
WITH ADMINISTRACAO AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT p.id as IDProcesso, sp.Id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim
    FROM shkprocesses sp
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
    LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
    LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
    LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
    LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id
    WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
    AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
    AND (c_estado_contratacao is null or c_estado_contratacao <> 'PND')
    AND dp.c_escalar_processo LIKE 'administracao'
    ORDER BY Urgencia desc, LimitTime desc),
DIRETORES AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT p.id as IDProcesso, sp.Id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim
    FROM shkprocesses sp
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
    LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
    LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
    LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
    LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id
    WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
    AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
    AND (c_estado_contratacao is null or c_estado_contratacao <> 'PND')
    AND dp.c_escalar_processo LIKE 'diretoresCoordenadores'
    ORDER BY Urgencia desc, LimitTime desc),
COORDENACAO AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT p.id as IDProcesso, sp.Id, FROM_UNIXTIME(floor(sact.activated/1000)) as dateCreated, sact.Name AS Atividade, sp.Name AS Processo, dp.c_urgencia AS Urgencia, dp.c_nome_banco AS NomeBanco, dp.c_n_wf_banco AS NumeroWFBanco, dp.c_n_wf_pl as NumeroWFPL, dp.c_tipo_processo as TipoProcesso, dp.c_nome_cliente as NomeCliente, c_estado_contratacao AS EstadoContratacao, sact.Id AS ActivityId, from_unixtime(sact.LimitTime/1000, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as limittime, sla.c_data_inicio as DataInicio,sla.c_data_fim as DataFim
    FROM shkprocesses sp
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_processos p on sp.ActivityRequesterProcessId = p.id
    LEFT JOIN shkprocessstates sps ON sps.oid = sp.State
    LEFT JOIN SHKActivities sact ON sact.ProcessId = sp.Id
    LEFT JOIN SHKActivityStates ssta ON ssta.oid = sact.State
    LEFT JOIN SHKAssignmentsTable sass ON sact.Id = sass.ActivityId
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_detalhe_processo dp ON dp.id = p.c_detalhe_processo
    LEFT JOIN app_fd_sla_atividade sla ON sla.c_id_processo = sp.Id
    WHERE sps.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running'
    AND (ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.not_running.not_started' OR ssta.KeyValue LIKE 'open.running')
    AND (c_estado_contratacao is null or c_estado_contratacao <> 'PND')
    AND dp.c_escalar_processo LIKE 'coordenador'
    ORDER BY Urgencia desc, LimitTime desc)
SELECT * FROM ADMINISTRACAO
UNION
SELECT * FROM DIRETORES
UNION
SELECT * FROM COORDENACAO
